items.title: iBNB finance project is born
details: Team shift focus from previous project to work on a new breakthrough idea
Expectations vs outcomes weighed up to see if the project is feasible
Team begin working on the back-end development of contract code as well as website and DaPP integrations
Stealth marketing campaign dropping small info about the new project in a select number of Telegram channels to allow word to spread organically
Begin writing the whitepaper getting it ready for Q3

items.title: iBNB website, whitepaper and contract is released
details: Global marketing networks begin operation, raising awareness in all continents
Token is publicly tradable on Pancake Swap

items.title: Full steam ahead
details: iBNB Fully trading and BNB rewards increasing
Starting work on iBNBv2 platform and Dapps

items.title: The world is our oyster
details: Finishing up work on iBNBv2 getting ready for launch later on in the year
